title: Artificial Intelligence and Robots - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/16/17
itunes:title: Artificial Intelligence and Robots - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/16/17
description:
George Noory and technology reporter Annalee Newitz discuss why so many people are afraid of artificial intelligence in computers, and whether improvements in robotics will lead to changes in how humans view concepts like war and companionship.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
